root.name: Jesus in Space
root.description: OverviewJesus in Space is a game by Sunday Software, Inc. developed for PC and Mac. The game puts the player in the role of Lieutenant Stu Dent and his pal Captain Paul Hammer as they venture across the universe bringing Christianity to recently discovered planets. Many of the NPCs are based off of elements of Jewish culture, including food and the Passover Seder.LevelsPlanet VetVet is a planet inhabited by fish creatures. Stu and Paul meet Minister Gil Filtafish and try to explain the concept of baptism to an underwater civilization. Stu's explanation takes the form of a quiz about baptism.Planet WhammoWhammo is inhabited by a Judaic tribe of robots. Chief Wackimac and his followers practice the Jewish tradition of Passover and the Seder meal. Stu and Paul come in to explain communion and the story of the Last Supper.Ice Moon AlphaStu and Paul venture to a planet inhabited by snowball men, led by Teacher Snobob. They ultimately put on a play about Jesus coming to Emmaus and discuss how to "see" Jesus.
